episode.title: Not the Batman We Want or Need
episode.rawTitle: 292: ‘Not the Batman We Want or Need’, With Rene Ritchie
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Rene Ritchie returns to the show. Topics include Phil Schiller advancing to Apple Fellow, Microsoft’s simmering spat with Apple over Xbox Game Pass and the App Store’s ban on game streaming services, and Epic’s sizzling spat with Apple over, well, the entire concept of iOS as we know it.
episode.showNotes:
Rene Ritchie returns to the show. Topics include Phil Schiller advancing to Apple Fellow, Microsoft’s simmering spat with Apple over Xbox Game Pass and the App Store’s ban on game streaming services, and Epic’s sizzling spat with Apple over, well, the entire concept of iOS as we know it.

  • Epic goes to war with Apple over the App Store.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
